title: Top 4 Places to Visit in Bermuda
text:
Top 4 Places to Visit in Bermuda Top 4 Places to Visit in Bermuda 0 
Whenever you start thinking about spending your next holiday in Bermuda, what is the first thing that you always think about? Most probably, you think about the right accommodation, because most of travelers do so. However, before searching for a right accommodation in Bermuda, you have to decide on which location you would like to visit first. If you have decided to stay in any of the popular places near the beach like Paget, Warwick or Southampton, then you will definitely get some excellent accommodations there, where you can experience the joy of touching the pink sands and turquoise water. You will be happy to know that some hotels and all inclusive resorts in Bermuda have their own private beaches. Check out some of the best places to stay in Bermuda. 
Advantage of Staying in Paget 
You can avail plenty of advantages from the place as you can visit the Hamilton city by taking a 10-munite bus ride, where you can get easy and quick access to some of the best restaurants, pubs and stores in the region. Most important thing is that no place in Bermuda is too far from the Paget. In addition, the popular Elbow beach is in Paget. 
Why You Should Stay in Warwick 
The main advantage of spending time in Warwick is residing near the south shore beaches of the island. Warwick beach is one of the best pink beaches in the island and most importantly, while staying in the area, you can touch the water of Warwick Long Bay. There are not too many luxury hotels or resorts available in the area, but you can easily get well-decorated apartments and guesthouses within your budget. If you want, you can make your own food by collecting food stuff and provisions from several grocery stores and supermarket in the area. 
Reasons to Stay in Southampton 
The main attraction of the place of its fabulous south shore beaches. Besides that, Horseshoe Bay Beach is one of the best sea beaches in the world. Apart from this, other popular beaches in the area are, Church Bay West Whale Bay Chaplin Bay 
You can avail many luxury hotels and resorts within a short distance from the beach. Moreover, apart from all inclusive resorts in Bermuda, many low-budget but standard guesthouses and apartments are available in the area. You will get some famous restaurants over there and some of them are located in the beach side. Bars and pubs are also popular in Southampton. 
Why You Should Stay in St George 
There are two major reasons for which people love to spend time in St George that is situated at Far East of the island. However, the first reason is that you could immerse yourself into the history of the region as many part of the place is bearing the memory of colonial period. 
The second reason is the airport, as you can check out anytime you want. However, many waterside cottages are available in the area that will definitely offer you great privacy. 
No matter which place you plan to visit, deciding on the accommodation first is always the right thing to do. So, lookout for the hotels or all inclusive resorts in Bermuda and enjoy your trip.
